Nerangs.ab: humaiia upaŋhā̊ cīšmaide ahunahe vairiiehe aṣ̌aiia frasrūtahe hāuuanaiiā̊sca aṣ̌aiia fraṣ̌ūtaiiā̊ aršuḫδanąmcā vacąm aϑā daste va hāvan čonke ḫoršid gardad va se bār gardeš zī.nə̄ humāiiōtarā aŋhən hum va urvarān kufte andar sar daste-ye hāvan nahādan bordan be-suy-e čab-e barsom nahādan

"humaiia upaŋhā̊ cīšmaide ahunahe vairiiehe aṣ̌aiia frasrūtahe hāuuanaiiā̊sca aṣ̌aiia fraṣ̌ūtaiiā̊ aršuḫδanąmcā vacąm aϑā. He has to turn three times the pestle over around the mortar in the direction in which the sun rotates. At humāiiōtarā aŋhən, he should hold the pounded hum and urvarān on the tip of the pestle of the hāvan, bring it to the left (of the barsom) and put it there."
